import React from 'react'; import bakeryImage from './bakery.PNG'; // Replace with your actual image path const AboutUs = () => (

About Us

Welcome to Faiths Confectionery! We are passion driven and dedicated to bringing you the finest baked goods made with the highest quality ingredients. Our passion for baking shines through in every product we create, ranging from our freshly baked products such ato our delectable pastries and cakes.

Our Services

  • Freshly baked bread and rolls
  • Wide variety of pastries and desserts
  • Custom cakes for all occasions
  • Catering services for events
  • Specialty coffee and tea

Hours of Operation

We are open 7 days a week to satisfy your cravings:

  • Monday - Friday: 7:00 AM - 7:00 PM
  • Saturday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
  • Sunday: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM

Our Story

Founded in 2010, Faith Confectionery Bakery has been a beloved part of the Sweetville community. Our founder, Jane Doe, started this bakery with a dream to share her love of baking with the world. Over the years, we have grown and evolved, but our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has remained the same. We look forward to serving you and making your day a little sweeter!

); export default AboutUs;
